verses.name: Numbers 26:51
verses.text: These were the numbered of the children of Israel, six hundred thousand and a thousand seven hundred and thirty.

verses.name: Numbers 26:52
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 26:53
verses.text: Unto these the land shall be divided for an inheritance according to the number of names.

verses.name: Numbers 26:54
verses.text: To many thou shalt give the more inheritance, and to few thou shalt give the less inheritance: to every one shall his inheritance be given according to those that were numbered of him.

verses.name: Numbers 26:55
verses.text: Notwithstanding the land shall be divided by lot: according to the names of the tribes of their fathers they shall inherit.
